sentences.english: C) It was produced in oxygen-free environments.
sentences.chinese: 它是在缺氧環境中產生的。

sentences.english: The child lived but had major medical problems including oxygen deprivation and bleeding in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 小孩存活了下來，但患有缺氧及腦出血等嚴重病症。

sentences.english: Thanks to the cracks, the fish in the lake don't die from the lack of oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 也多虧了裂縫，湖裏的魚纔不會缺氧致死。

sentences.english: In construction site, air is thin, oxygen is lack and it is very cold.
sentences.chinese: 施工區空氣稀薄，嚴重缺氧，氣候寒冷。

sentences.english: Lake Aha, located in the suburb of Guiyang, Guizhou Province, is a medium artificial reservoir with seasonally anoxic hypolimina.
sentences.chinese: 貴州阿哈湖是一底層滯水帶季節性缺氧的中型人工湖。

sentences.english: Their approach involves pyrolysis, decomposing organic material with heat in the absence of oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 他們通過在缺氧的環境下對有機物進行熱分解。

sentences.english: The two tried to share air, but panic took hold of the out-of-air diver.
sentences.chinese: 兩個人分享氧氣，但是驚慌毀掉了缺氧潛水者。

sentences.english: To observe the hypoxia tolerance test and fatigue tolerance test of mice given CTCC.
sentences.chinese: 觀察各給藥組小鼠的耐疲勞能力及耐缺氧能力。

sentences.english: Conclusion FBE can increase the anti- hypoxic effect of animals.
sentences.chinese: 結論竹葉提取物能提高整體動物的抗缺氧能力。

sentences.english: The right ventricle pumps deoxygenated blood to the lung.
sentences.chinese: 右心室將缺氧血液泵往肺部。

sentences.english: It has been proved that NGB could protect the neuron from hypoxic injury.
sentences.chinese: 已有研究表明腦紅蛋白能夠保護神經元免受缺氧損傷。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the electric physiologic changes in newborn piglets with HIBD.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察缺氧缺血性腦損傷新生豬腦電生理的變化。

sentences.english: In neonatal stadium, 1 patient was found with hypoxia-ischemic encephalopathy, and 4 with cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 新生兒期發現缺血缺氧性腦病1例，顱內出血4例。

sentences.english: It gets your body going with limited oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 這讓身體習慣缺氧的狀態。

sentences.english: This would include cases where heart tissue becomes damaged after being deprived temporarily of oxygen due to a blockage in the blood supply.
sentences.chinese: 包括由於血液堵塞引起短暫缺氧而受損的心臟組織。

sentences.english: They feed on hydrogen sulphide in oxygen-starvedwaters in a band off Peru and Chile.
sentences.chinese: 它們在祕魯和智利一帶缺氧的水域以硫化氫爲食。

definition: decompression sickness/the bends/also 減壓症|减压症[jian3 ya1 zheng4]
